name: grunt-github-api-example
description: Grunt plugin used to query the Github API and save the returned JSON files locally.
notes: This is an example repository for the [grunt-github-api](https://github.com/JeffHerb/grunt-github-api-example/) project. For additional information on this project see the [plugin page](https://github.com/JeffHerb/grunt-github-api-example/).
keywords: gruntplugin, github, pages, git, github pages
